overview: Mark started in the software industry in 1992 working in marketing for the largest programming software reseller at that time. Since then he has worked with a variety of companies in marketing, sales and general management. Mark recently founded inSequent, a mobile marketing platform provider for local business. Prior to InSequent, Mark founded Convergent Mobile Devices (later Convergent Mobile, Inc.) in 2006 and was its CEO until 2009 and remains a shareholder. Prior to Convergent, he founded Landmark Productions (later to became Httprint) - a commercial print e-procurement and services company.
